definitions: in a manner relating to the body as opposed to the mind
shortDefinitions: in manner relating to body as opposed to mind

definitions: in a way that involves bodily contact or activity
shortDefinitions: in way that involves bodily contact

definitions: in a way that relates to the real world and things perceived through the senses as opposed to the mind

examples.text: cyberspace is a virtual place; it does not physically exist

shortDefinitions: in a way that relates to the real world

definitions: in terms of what is possible in the real world

examples.text: it is physically impossible to check every car

shortDefinitions: in terms of what is possible
